manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Shampoo Cleanses as it adds lightweight shine and volume. Conditioner Adds weightless moisture to the fiber, ensuring shine for manageable, voluminous hair. Full-Lift Volumizer Leave-in spray expands volume by multiplying inter-fiber space for fullness that doesn’t fall flat. Whipped Mousse Provides body, control, and shine while leaving hair with bounce and natural softness.

When Should I use VolumeBloom? VolumeBloom is for anyone with flat or fine hair looking to add volume and fuller body. How does VolumeBloom work? VolumeBloom Shampoo and Conditioner plumps fine hair with long-lasting, volumizing bounce. It provides root lift, giving hair 70% more volume after just one application when using the full VolumeBloom system. Did the Biolage Professional packaging change? Yes, as of 2022 we have a new look with the same iconic formula. It’s the same great performance you know and love, now with a refreshed look! Are all Biolage Professional products sold on Amazon.com authentic and official? Yes, Amazon.com is an authorized retailer and only sells authentic Biolage Professional products.

Commitment to Sustainability From formulas to packaging, all of our products are produced through responsible manufacturing and green science. Sensorial Experiences Iconic uplifting fragrances act as a meaningful emotional trigger that represents a moment of small indulgence, escape and revitalization. Innovation in Conditioning Biolage was the first brand to introduce a silicone-free conditioning balm and the first to teach stylists the benefits of reverse washing. Cruelty Free All Biolage products are now officially cruelty-free. The brand has been given the Leaping Bunny stamp of approval by Cruelty Free International.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase for us fine-haired people with longer hair
reviews.reviewText: I saw this product in media somewhere and I was so intrigued, I bought it (which was great, since it was discounted when I purchased it). I have thinning, aging, fine hair (hair condition) and really stubborn seb derm (never-ending scalp woes). I am a sworn fan of Biosilk products that do an excellent job of softening texture, increasing manageability, and adding glossy shine. I sometimes have to use caustic scalp shampoos or pre-treatments for seb derm, which often sadly don't work well (none of them) and I have cost myself tons of hair just trying to fix my scalp aggressively. I only bought the Biolage Volumizing Shampoo (nothing else), and upon first use, wow! -- this stuff is great! I washed my hair as usual, noting the shampoo looks much like conditioner, but don't be fooled, it lathers up very well without too much. The scent is herbal with a predominant minty note; the fragrance did not stick around on my hair and was more like an aromatherapy bonus in-shower. I air-dried my hair as usual post-shower, flipping it around in the process to fluff hairs up around the roots in different directions, and the results were great! I had defined layers without any crunchiness at all, I did not lose an eyebrow-raising amount of hair in the shower, and the end look was soft, bouncy, and healthy with no styling products other than my usual Biolsilk serum. I will repurchase this shampoo again, probably in a long time because the generous size will last me a long time as a shampoo-rotater.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice shampoo for fine hair
reviews.reviewText: Am a senior with "baby fine" hair all my life. The scent is not bad (have asthma). Nice lather. Hair feels clean and soft after shampooing and have not needed to use a conditioner. Am new user to this brand and so far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This shampoo feels and smells so good! I searched out many products to compare ratings and performance and decided on this one. I am so glad I did. It lathers nicely, gives my hair more volume and shine, and styles more easily. This is a professional level product to me. Jana
